summary: SINDHUPALCHOK, DEC 21 - Four people were  electrocuted  when a moving bus came in contact with a live wire here at Kattike in the district on Sunday. The deceased--two each women and men--were commuting by the bus. The bus heading for Jalbire from Kathmandu came in contact with a high tension wire after it snapped.
title: four-electrocuted-as-high-tension-wire-snaps
